"},{"text":"Enderman Support Class","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Endermen will buff nearby hostile mobs, giving them extra abilities.

Some mobs get potion effects, while others give effects to nearby players."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.enderman_support_class.1"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Creepers
- Gets Regeneration II
Cave Spiders
- Gets Jump Boost II
Silverfish
- Gets Resistance II
Spider
- Gets Jump Boost I
Zombie
- Gets Speed II
Skeleton
- Gives Weakness II
Shulker
- Gives Blindness"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.enderman_support_class.2"}]}]
